description: This file defines a SearchBar React component using Qwik framework. It provides a debounced search input that updates URL query parameters and triggers a callback on input changes.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main component function that accepts SearchBarProps and returns a JSX element.

methods.name: useSignal
methods.description: Creates reactive signals for component state management.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up a side effect that runs when the component becomes visible.
